Title: DB To DGML
Description:
This project enables generation of a DGML visualisation model of SQL Server databases.
This DGML model utilises nodes and groups for database, schemas, tables and then the field values (differentiating primary / foreign key and optional fields).
Currently UI is a basic C# WPF app
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project enables generation of a DGML visualisation model of SQL Server databases.
This DGML model utilises nodes and groups for database, schemas, tables and then the field values (differentiating primary / foreign key and optional fields).
Currently UI is a basic C# WPF app

NOTE: You will need to have VS2010 Ultimate edition to view the DGML generated files.

Example Screenshot (of piece of Northwind database in DGML) at http://dbtodgml.codeplex.com/releases/view/49489#DownloadId=138582
